Olutayo Asaolu is a dynamic Data & BI Analyst, data science enthusiast, and technology strategist with over a decade of experience bridging the gap between data, digital innovation, and strategic decision-making. With a strong foundation in retail analytics, full-stack web development, and academic research, he excels at transforming complex data into actionable insights that drive business growth and operational efficiency. Currently pursuing a PhD in Business Administration with a focus on entrepreneurship and small business management, Tayo is passionate about leveraging data-driven solutions to empower enterprises and build scalable, inclusive digital ecosystems across emerging markets.
